title: INVENTORY / SMALLEST CHURCH TAPE
description: tape interactable in inventory; smallest church in saint-saens with all the dialogue necessary. item pickup in world.

dialogueTree.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "The porta-reel is just what you nee..."
dialogueTree.text: The porta-reel is just what you needed -- the reels attach to the apparatus with a satisfying click. The tape is routed behind the magnetic reader.

links.title: You: "Press play on tape."
links.text: Press play on tape.

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "You press the large button marked *..."
links.text: You press the large button marked *Commencer* and the tape starts spinning. There's a small delay before the song starts playing...

links.title: You: "Press your ear against the speaker."
links.text: Press your ear against the speaker.

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "It sounds like someone's moving in..."
links.text: It sounds like someone's moving in the room, getting comfortable. Then the organ starts playing a simple melancholic tune, echoing in the hallway. A lone singing voice joins in...

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "Telling you about the tiniest churc..."
links.text: Telling you about the tiniest church in Saint-Saëns, surrounded by even tinier yard. You almost feel the seaside mist on your skin. It's *mega* sad.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Within seconds you know -- this is..."
links.text: Within seconds you know -- this is the one. The *real shit* you've been looking for. The one you trashed your room to. This one tells it like it is. This is your tune.

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "A click -- then silence, for a bit...."
links.text: A click -- then silence, for a bit. Then the tape stops spinning.

links.title: You: "Could I sing this for karaoke? I th..."
links.text: Could I sing this for karaoke? I think I could sing this.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Of course you could sing this! You..."
links.text: Of course you could sing this! You could take sad to a whole new level with this. And you already know the lyrics since you've listened to it, like, a million times!

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Yup. They're all here. All three ve..."
links.text: Yup. They're all here. All three verses.

links.title: Inland Empire: "*And* the B-side of the tape contai..."
links.text: *And* the B-side of the tape contains the instrumental version. It's like the world itself is telling you to do it. Only one obstacle stands on your way...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Garte. You have to convince Garte t..."
links.text: Garte. You have to convince Garte to let you sing karaoke in the Whirling. After you've won him over, you can *express* yourself. Let the pain out. Make everyone understand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you as you..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you as you remove the tape from the boombox. He doesn't say anything.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant watches you pack up..."
links.text: The lieutenant watches you pack up the boombox. He doesn't say anything.

links.title: You: "Nothing can stop me now."
links.text: Nothing can stop me now.

links.title: You: "No, I couldn't! It's too sad, I mig..."
links.text: No, I couldn't! It's too sad, I might cry and trash the room again.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Crying is good, it gives your perfo..."
links.text: Crying is good, it gives your performance authenticity. Besides, you already know the lyrics since you've listened to it, like, a million times!

links.title: You: "Scratch that, I'm already crying. A..."
links.text: Scratch that, I'm already crying. And I look dumb. And old.

links.title: You: "Remove the tape."
links.text: Remove the tape.

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "Immediately the boombox tunes itsel..."
links.text: Immediately the boombox tunes itself back to the Friday night beats, vibrating on your shoulder.

links.title: Logic: "Nothing to do with this right now."
links.text: Nothing to do with this right now.

links.title: You: "Keep the porta-reel at the harmless..."
links.text: Keep the porta-reel at the harmless distance and wait.

links.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "Then the organ starts playing a sim..."
links.text: Then the organ starts playing a simple melancholic tune, echoing in the hallway. A lone singing voice joins in...

links.title: You: "Not now. [Put the tape away.]"
links.text: Not now. [Put the tape away.]

dialogueTree.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "The porta-reel is just what you nee..."
dialogueTree.text: The porta-reel is just what you needed -- the reels attach to the apparatus with a satisfying click. The tape is routed behind the magnetic reader.

dialogueTree.title: "Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns": "There's no way to listen to the tap..."
dialogueTree.text: There's no way to listen to the tape without a working tape player or porta-reel at hand.

links.title: Inland Empire: "But even just holding the tape make..."
links.text: But even just holding the tape makes you feel a little sad...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A pawnshop -- a pawnshop would have..."
links.text: A pawnshop -- a pawnshop would have a tape player...
